_sText:
**WARNING THIS MAP WAS FIRST MADE AS A TEST**

Hello, This map has lots of bugs. But this map has a great gameplay. In this Defuse map theres three houses in everysingle house spawns ct [there are 3houses] Terrorists spawn outside, terrorists have to break into one of the houses tru the door,cave,vent and plant the bomb. Max Counter-Terrorists count is 3, Max Terrorists count is 10. I recommend you play 3 vs 3 or 2v2 but of course play with real people because thats way more fun but if you can't do that just play with bots.

Known bugs:
Buggy vents
invisible ladder in third house's cave
Ct's can spawn into eatch other I don't know how to fix that [its rare]

Theres way more bugs but I forgot almost all of them so yeah.
Please have in mind that i made this map for testing and after like 2hours I made this map have a good gameplay and really fun i played this map with my 2friends and one bot. It was fun.
